    All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages

    A

    add(Animal) - Method in class Zoo
    Adds an animal to the zoo, placing it into either the safe or dangerous group based on the current danger threshold.
    adjustDangerThreshold(int) - Method in class Zoo
    Adjusts the zoo's danger threshold and reclassifies all animals between the safe and dangerous groups based on the new threshold.
    Animal - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents an animal with a specific species, name, and danger level.
    Animal(String, String, int) - Constructor for class Animal
    Constructs a new Animal with the specified species, name, and danger level.

    C

    compareTo(Animal) - Method in class Animal
    Compares this Animal with the specified Animal for order.

    E

    equals(Object) - Method in class Animal
    Compares this Animal to the specified object for equality.

    G

    getDangerLevel() - Method in class Animal
    Returns the danger level of this animal.
    getDangerous() - Method in class Zoo
    Returns a list of all dangerous animals in the zoo.
    getName() - Method in class Animal
    Returns the name of this animal.
    getSafe() - Method in class Zoo
    Returns a list of all safe animals in the zoo.
    getSpecies() - Method in class Animal
    Returns the species of this animal.

    H

    hashCode() - Method in class Animal
    Returns a hash code value for this Animal.

    L

    load(String) - Method in class Zoo
    Loads animal data from a file and adds them to the zoo based on the current danger threshold.

    R

    remove(Animal) - Method in class Zoo
    Removes the specified animal from the zoo, regardless of whether it is safe or dangerous.

    T

    toString() - Method in class Animal
    Returns a string representation of this Animal.
    toString() - Method in class Zoo
    Returns a string representation of the zoo, including the current danger threshold and the contents of both the dangerous and safe animal collections.

    Z

    Zoo - Class in Unnamed Package
    Represents a zoo that categorizes animals into dangerous or safe groups based on a configurable danger threshold.
    Zoo(int) - Constructor for class Zoo
    Creates a new empty zoo with the specified danger threshold.
    Zoo(String, int) - Constructor for class Zoo
    Creates a new zoo by loading animal data from a file and applying the specified danger threshold.
